title: Africans transported to new world graph - cause

content.prompt: Which of the following contributed most directly to the change in the number of Africans transported to the New World after 1800?

choices.label: The emergence of a more industrial economy in Great Britain and the United States
The outlawing of the international slave trade by Great Britain and the United States
The increased resistance to slavery within African nations
The influence of major slave rebellions in Haiti and elsewhere
